ilda

Class OptimisationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • ilda.OptimisationSettings

  • public class OptimisationSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Bundles all optimisation settings so they are easily shared across the package and easily transported to other projects. You can create a settings file for each projector and load it in all your sketches and projects without having to recreate the settings again.
